subject: fix(interest-form): align with external API contract
body:
Two mismatches with the API's expected payload:

1. _honeypot field: The frontend did a client-side check but never sent
   the field to the server. Now sends _honeypot: '' in every request so
   bots bypassing frontend JS still get caught by the server's 400.

2. message field: Frontend marked it as "(optional)" but the API requires
   it. Now required with HTML validation. Test updated to match â€” empty
   message is rejected.

Tags: api-contract, bugfix, forms
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: portfolio-polish
Semver: patch

title: align with external API contract
